c74object.name: fl.lookup~
c74object.digest: Use one frame as a lookup table for another.
c74object.description: The left input frame is used to lookup values from the last values received as the right input frame. The output is the same size as the left input, which is interpreted as a set of sample positions used to read the right input. Only the left input triggers output.

entry.name: 0. /mode [enum]
entry.description:
No parameter info available
[0] - zero [1] - clip

entry.name: 1. /interp [enum]
entry.description:
No parameter info available
[0] - hermite [1] - bspline [2] - lagrange [3] - linear [4] - none

entry.name: 2. /scale [enum]
entry.description:
No parameter info available
[0] - samples [1] - normalised [2] - bipolar
